description: i've been looking for an app like this for so long on linux

Needs more work. Not accurate. It doesn't reset the previous day usage and start over when it's a new day, no, it keeps reporting through the new day. Also, pretty much 90% of the apps' icons are not supported. So far for me, it only recognizes Firefox icon, and the rest are just sheets of paper. Contacting the dev on gitlab/reporting things doesn't get you anything, as they always blame things on the "backend" activitywatch. Will uninstall for now.

it needs ActivityWatch installed as well a
perhaps add a button to the app for dependencies installation..?
